title: Update regarding BlockChain Verify
story_body:
BLACKROCK, INC. PROVIDES UPDATE ON PERSONNEL, MARKETING INITIATIVES, AND ENVIRONMENTAL, SOCIAL, AND GOVERNANCE (ESG) EFFORTS

As of 2023-02-15 08:00:00 EST, BlackRock, Inc. (BLK) has announced the following updates:

Personnel:
BlackRock, Inc. has appointed a new member to its Global Executive Committee. Effective immediately, Ms. Barbara Novick will assume the role of Vice Chairman, responsible for overseeing the company's global public policy and government relations efforts.

Marketing Initiatives:
BlackRock, Inc. has launched a new digital advertising campaign aimed at promoting its iShares exchange-traded funds (ETFs) to individual investors. The campaign, which began on 2023-02-01, will run across various online platforms and is expected to continue through the end of the second quarter.

Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) Efforts:
BlackRock, Inc. has released its 2022 ESG Stewardship Report, detailing the company's progress on its ESG initiatives. The report highlights BlackRock's engagement with portfolio companies on ESG issues, including climate change and board diversity. As of 2022-12-31, BlackRock's ESG-themed ETFs had approximately USD 195 billion in assets under management.

These updates are part of BlackRock, Inc.'s ongoing efforts to enhance its organizational structure, expand its product offerings, and promote sustainable investing practices.
